metadata.title: CVE-2022-43357 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Stack overflow vulnerability in ast_selectors.cpp in functionSass::CompoundSelector::has_real_parent_ref in libsass:3.6.5-8-g210218,which can be exploited by attackers to causea denial of service (DoS). Alsoaffects the command line driver for libsass, sassc 3.6.2.

criterions.comment: libsass package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
